name: openai-cost-calculator-with-lanchain
summary: A library to estimate OpenAI API costs based on token usage, integrating with Langchain. This is a fork from v1.1.1 of openai_cost_calculator by Orkun Kınay and Murat Barkın Kınay (https://github.com/orkunkinay/openai_cost_calculator).
author: Marco Pennacchiotti (forked from openai_cost_calculator by Orkun Kınay and Murat Barkın Kınay)
